init.title: Options
init.description:
Sensor updates are only ever done when a Bluetooth advertisement is seen, so the rate limit is a way of throttling updates if the device is sending out a lot of advertisements.

It is recommended to select the appropriate battery chemistry as the BM2 by default is extremely optimistic with regards to percentage and overall state!

custom_battery_details.title: Custom battery values
custom_battery_details.description: Provide the appropriate voltage thresholds for your battery so its state can be monitored correctly.  The overall percentage status will be determined from the 0%, 20%, 50% and 100% figures provided, with interpolation as required.
